snippet: The Southern Front of the Free Syrian Army declared that they had seized the base in a six-hour lightning advance, suggesting the group still has some strength.
abstract: Insurgency called Southern Front of the Free Syrian Army takes major army base in southern Syrian province of Dara'a; coalition is trained and armed by United States and its Arab allies.
lead_paragraph: The Southern Front of the Free Syrian Army declared that they had seized the base in a six-hour lightning advance, suggesting the group still has some strength.

headline.main: Rebels Seize Syrian Army Base in a Blow to Assad
headline.print_headline: Rebels Seize Army Base in a Blow to Assad
